thread.title: Football: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku linked with move to Manchester United
thread.title_full: Football: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku linked with move to Manchester United

title: Football: Everton striker Romelu Lukaku linked with move to Manchester United
text:
By Game Yetu Tuesday, February 21st 2017 at 00:00 
Manchester United have been given hope in their pursuit of Everton striker Romelu Lukaku. 
Calciomercarto claim that the Toffees have already eyed up a replacement for the Belgian, in preparation for his potential departure from Goodison Park this summer. 
United have been among the teams interested in taking the 23-year-old and he could be the perfect long-term alternative to Zlatan Ibrahimovic. 
And Everton appear to be set to make an offer for Palermo striker Ilija Nestorovski, which could speed up Lukaku's exit. 
Everton would demand a sizable transfer fee for Lukaku.
